meanings.meaning_en_US: A married woman whose main occupation is managing the household and caring for children.

examples.sentence: The [housewife] prepared dinner for her family.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 家庭主婦為她的家人準備晚餐。

examples.sentence: Being a [housewife] can be very rewarding.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 家庭主婦的生活可以非常有成就感。

examples.sentence: A [housewife] often manages the household budget.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 家庭主婦經常負責家庭預算。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Constituting number twelve in a sequence.

examples.sentence: The event is scheduled for the [twelfth] of November.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個活動定於十一月的第十二日舉行

examples.sentence: She won her [twelfth] award this year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她今年贏得了第十二個獎項

examples.sentence: On the [twelfth] day, they celebrated with a feast.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在第十二天，他們舉辦了慶祝盛宴

meanings.meaning_en_US: A small number of; not many.

examples.sentence: I have [few] friends in this city.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我在這個城市裡有少數幾個朋友

examples.sentence: She took a [few] minutes to think.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她花了幾分鐘思考

examples.sentence: There are [few] options available.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 有少數選項可用

meanings.meaning_en_US: The number following seventeen and preceding nineteen.

examples.sentence: She turned [eighteen] last month.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她上個月滿了十八歲。

examples.sentence: There are [eighteen] students in the class.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 班上有十八名學生。

examples.sentence: He will be eligible to vote when he turns [eighteen].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 當他滿十八歲時就可以投票。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A percussion instrument typically consisting of a circular frame covered with a membrane, producing sound when struck.

examples.sentence: He played the [drum] at the concert.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在音樂會上打了鼓。

examples.sentence: The [drum] echoed through the valley.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 鼓聲在山谷中回蕩。

examples.sentence: She loves the sound of the [drum] in the marching band.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡樂隊中鼓的聲音。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Not under the control or in the power of another; able to act or be done as one wishes.

examples.sentence: You are [free] to make your own choices.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以自由地做出自己的選擇。

examples.sentence: The birds flew [free] in the open sky.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 鳥兒在天空中自由地飛翔。

examples.sentence: She felt [free] after quitting her job.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在辭職後感到自由。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A competition of speed.

examples.sentence: The [race] was exciting and very close.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這場比賽令人興奮且非常接近。

examples.sentence: She finished first in the [race].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在這場比賽中獲得第一名。

examples.sentence: They are training hard for the upcoming [race].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在為即將到來的比賽而努力訓練。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A machine capable of carrying out a complex series of actions automatically.

examples.sentence: The [robot] can help with household chores.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個機器人可以幫助做家務

examples.sentence: They designed a new [robot] for manufacturing.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們設計了一個新的機器人來進行製造

examples.sentence: He built a [robot] that can walk and talk.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他建造了一個能走和說話的機器人

meanings.meaning_en_US: The period of 24 hours as a unit of time.

examples.sentence: There are seven [days] in a week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一週有七天。

examples.sentence: She spent many [days] traveling across Europe.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她花了很多天在歐洲旅行。

examples.sentence: The [days] are getting longer as summer approaches.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 隨著夏天的到來，白天越來越長。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Regard something as likely to happen.

examples.sentence: I [expect] to receive my package soon.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我期待很快收到我的包裹。

examples.sentence: They [expect] a lot from their employees.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們對員工的期待很高。

examples.sentence: We always [expect] the best outcomes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們總是期待最好的結果。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Being number 1000 in a sequence.

examples.sentence: She was the [thousandth] customer of the day.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是今天的第一千位顧客

examples.sentence: The event marked the [thousandth] anniversary of the city.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個事件標誌著這座城市的第一千周年

examples.sentence: He finished in [thousandth] place in the ranking.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在排名中獲得第一千名

meanings.meaning_en_US: Of a size that is less than normal or usual.

examples.sentence: He has a [small] pet dog.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他有一隻小狗。

examples.sentence: The room is quite [small].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這間房間相當小。

examples.sentence: She wore a [small] hat that looked cute.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她戴著一頂看起來可愛的小帽子。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Affected by physical or mental illness.

examples.sentence: He stayed home because he was feeling [sick].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他因為感覺不適而待在家裡

examples.sentence: She looked [sick] after missing several meals.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她錯過幾餐後看起來很虛弱

examples.sentence: The [sick] child needs to see a doctor.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 生病的孩子需要看醫生

meanings.meaning_en_US: A printed publication containing news, articles, advertisements, and other items.

examples.sentence: He reads the [newspaper] every morning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他每天早上讀報紙。

examples.sentence: The [newspaper] reported on the local events.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 報紙報導了當地的事件。

examples.sentence: She writes articles for a [newspaper].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為一家報紙寫文章。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The number equivalent to the sum of three and eleven.

examples.sentence: I will turn [fourteen] next month.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我下個月就滿十四歲了

examples.sentence: There are [fourteen] days in the two-week period.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 兩週中有十四天

examples.sentence: He scored [fourteen] points in the game.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在比賽中得了十四分

meanings.meaning_en_US: To say or do something again.

examples.sentence: Can you [repeat] that question?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能重複那個問題嗎？

examples.sentence: He had to [repeat] his speech for the audience.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他不得不為觀眾重複他的演講。

examples.sentence: She played the song and asked him to [repeat] after her.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她播放了這首歌並要求他跟著她重複。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A viscous liquid derived from plants, animals, or minerals, used for cooking, lubrication, or as fuel.

examples.sentence: She added a spoonful of [oil] to the pan.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在鍋裡加了一勺油。

examples.sentence: The car needs more [oil] to function smoothly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這輛車需要更多的油才能正常運行。

examples.sentence: The salad was dressed with olive [oil].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 沙拉上淋上了橄欖油。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Each of the four divisions of the year (spring, summer, autumn, winter).

examples.sentence: Winter is my favorite [season].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 冬天是我最喜歡的季節。

examples.sentence: The [season] for apples is in the fall.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 蘋果的季節是在秋天。

examples.sentence: What is your favorite [season] of the year?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你一年中最喜歡的季節是什麼？

meanings.meaning_en_US: An assembly of people for discussion or decision making.

examples.sentence: The [meeting] is scheduled for 10 AM.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議定於上午10點舉行。

examples.sentence: She prepared notes for the [meeting].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為會議準備了筆記。

examples.sentence: They had a productive [meeting] last week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們上週舉行了一次有效的會議。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The unit of reproduction of a flowering plant, capable of developing into another such plant.

examples.sentence: He planted a [seed] in the soil.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他把一顆種子種進了土壤。

examples.sentence: The [seed] needs sunlight and water to grow.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這顆種子需要陽光和水才能生長。

examples.sentence: Different types of [seeds] produce different plants.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 不同類型的種子會產生不同的植物。
